Title: xine-lib: Format string vulnerability
Synopsis:
xine-lib contains a format string error in CDDB response handling that may
    be exploited to execute arbitrary code.

Background.Text: xine-lib is a multimedia library which can be utilized to create multimedia frontends. It includes functions to retrieve information about audio CD contents from public CDDB servers.

Description.Text: Ulf Harnhammar discovered a format string bug in the routines handling CDDB server response contents.

Impact.Text: An attacker could submit malicious information about an audio CD to a public CDDB server (or impersonate a public CDDB server). When the victim plays this CD on a multimedia frontend relying on xine-lib, it could end up executing arbitrary code.

Workaround.Text: There is no known workaround at this time.

P.Text: All xine-lib users should upgrade to the latest version:
